This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/carin-bb/CodeSystem/C4BBAdjudicationDiscriminator defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
allowedunits allowed unitsdefines the adjudication slice to define allowed units
denialreason Denial Reasondefines the adjudication slice to identify the denial reason

name: C4BBAdjudicationDiscriminator
title: C4BB Adjudication Discriminator
description: Used as the discriminator for the data elements in adjudication and item.adjudication

concept.definition: defines the adjudication slice to define allowed units
defines the adjudication slice to identify the denial reason
